content: looking for a quick and fun halloween project this mini ghost crochet pattern is the perfect mix of spooky and cute each ghost works up in just a few rounds making it a great beginner project or last-minute holiday decoration you can crochet a single ghost as a tiny amigurumi or stitch a whole bunch to create a festive crochet ghost garland with only basic stitches a little bit of yarn and a few minutes of your time you ll have an adorable handmade decoration ready for the spooky season
